Class Trader

java.lang.Object
models.Trader

public class Trader
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransactionProcess
This class creates an instance of Trader

Zahid Khan 21/04/21

    • addToItemsBought

      public java.lang.String addToItemsBought​(Item newItem, int quantity)
      After the purchase is completed, bought items are added to an array, if the item bought is an upgrad which is used straight away hence not added to the ItemBought array.
      Parameters:
      newItem - of type Item, an item that we bought
      quantity - of type Integer, the number of items bought

    • useUpgrades

      newItem - type item upgrades
      quantity - type Integer number of upgrades
